title: Stay in Viceroy Luxury at Chicago’s #1 Hotel
description: Discover everything the ‘Windy City’ has to offer, staying in a fabulous central location at the five-star Viceroy Chicago - declared the #1 hotel in Chicago in Travel + Leisure’s ‘World’s Best’ Awards 2019. Your escape includes a daily US$30 breakfast credit to use at the hotel’s glossy Somerset restaurant or on in-room dining, guaranteed late checkout until 2pm and a 25% discount on blissful treatments at Exhale Spa.
offer_address: 1118 N State St, Chicago, IL 60610, United States

title: Experience Chicago's Architectural Magnificence at the 1920's Art Deco Designed Talbott Hotel
description: Discover the Windy City of Chicago with an exclusive stay at The Talbott Hotel - one of the best hotels in the city according to Conde Nast Traveler, TripAdvisor, Time Out and Travel+Leisure. Housed in a renovated 1920's building, The Talbott Hotel is just steps from the famous Magnificent Mile, Chicago’s vibrant and upscale commercial hub. Embrace the city life and enjoy daily breakfast, a nightly cocktail per person, a daily US$25 credit to be used towards food and beverages at the hotel’s restaurant or for in-room service, and the Urban Amenity Fee which includes a welcome beer or wine on arrival, access to the state-of-the-art fitness room, complimentary tea or coffee in the lobby, digital access to the New York Times, exclusive discounts at the neighbouring shops and boutiques, complimentary Wi-Fi and so much more.
offer_address: 20 E Delaware Place, Chicago, IL 60611, USA

title: Stylish Chicago West Loop City Break near Restaurant Row & Fulton Market
description: Discover the best of one of the Windy City’s trendy downtown with a stay at Crowne Plaza Chicago West Loop, an IHG Hotel. Located within an easy walk of some of the city’s best dining precincts - including Randolph Street’s ‘Restaurant Row’ and Fulton Market’s ultra-hip eateries - it’s an ideal gateway to Chicago’s very best. Return to laidback plates and good times at Rye Deli & Drink, the hotel’s charming onsite eatery.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Chicago West Loop, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 25 South Halsted Street, Chicago, Illinois 60661, United States

title: Stylish Downtown Chicago Escape near Millennium Park with Restaurant & Pool
description: Begin your Windy City adventure with a sophisticated stay at the voco Chicago Downtown, an IHG Hotel. Set in the River North district, this contemporary retreat is steps from the Magnificent Mile's high-end boutiques and the city's celebrated culinary scene. Enjoy a crafted cocktail and savour delicious American fare at Waterview on the 15th floor, grab a quick bite to eat from Riverbend Market, or take a relaxing dip in the heated pool.
location_description: voco Chicago Downtown, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 350 W Wolf Point Plaza, Chicago, Illinois 60654, USA

title: Stylish Chicago Escape in Trendy River North District with Rooftop Lounge
description:
Breeze into the Windy City and experience the best of Chicago with a stay at the perpetually stylish Godfrey Hotel. Centrally located in the heart of the River North district, this boutique hotel - with a striking Cubist-influenced façade - is just moments from world-class dining, entertainment and shopping on the Magnificent Mile and Michigan Avenue, with Millennium Park and the Art Institute of Chicago within close reach.

When you need a break from unearthing the best the city has to offer, each of the 221 hotel rooms have been designed to feel like a relaxing retreat away from the bustling streets below, boasting a sleek and stylish interior. Take a moment to recharge and unwind at the hotel’s 24-hour fitness centre or tranquil spa, before making your way to the top floor to get a taste of the vibrant nightlife at I|O Rooftop Lounge, where you can bask in the sunlight and enjoy sweeping views of the dazzling skyline.
offer_address: 127 W Huron at LaSalle Chicago IL 60654 United States

title: Historic French-Inspired Luxury in the Heart of Chicago with Day Spa & Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description:
Experience the allure of the Windy City with a stay at a luxurious hotel, majestically towering over the heart of Chicago's Magnificent Mile. Surrounded by the city's finest dining, shopping, and cultural attractions, this architectural marvel offers the perfect base for exploring the city's vibrant scene.

Just moments away, you'll find the Art Institute of Chicago, the Navy Pier, and the iconic Millennium Park. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's chic lounge for a craft cocktail or savour French-inspired dishes at the onsite CDA Restaurant.
offer_address: 20 E Chestnut St, Chicago, Illinois 60611, USA

title: Chicago Riverside Retreat Near Lake Michigan with Two Restaurants & Penthouse Fitness Centre
description:
Buckle up for a Chicago stay that's anything but ordinary. Swissôtel is where Swiss slickness meets Windy City style, dropping you right in the heart and soul of the third-largest city in the US. With wrap-around views from Navy Pier to Millenium Park and top-notch amenities, your stay here is all about convenience and spotless European-style service.

Amuse is your friendly downtown coffee shop and bar in the bustling Lakeshore East neighbourhood, while The Palm serves up prime beef, Nova Scotia lobsters and traditional Italian flavours all day long. Fitness fanatics can crush their workout in the 43rd-floor penthouse fitness centre, while a knockout spa is on hand to help you unwind.
offer_address: 323 East Upper Wacker Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60601-9722, United States

vendor_name: The Royal Sonesta Chicago River North
title: Downtown Chicago Central Escape with Rooftop Swimming Pool & Outdoor Sundeck
description: Stay moments away from Chicago's must-visit sights when you stay at the stylish Royal Sonesta Chicago River North. With a convenient location in the heart of the action, stay within walking distance to the likes of Michigan Avenue, Navy Pier and Millennium Park. When you're not exploring the area, escape to the hotel's 17th-floor indoor heated swimming pool and spacious outdoor sundeck, an oasis in the heart of the city. If you're looking to stretch and sweat, the sleek centre features Peloton Bikes and a stellar view over the city. Feeling hungry? Head to C.B.R, the hotel's dining venue where creative menus, extensive whisky varieties and craft cocktails are in abundance.
offer_address: 505 N State St, Chicago, IL 60654, United States

title: Top-Rated Contemporary Luxury in the Heart of Chicago
description:
Discover the best the Windy City has to offer with a stay at Hotel Julian, ranked in the top 10% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. Housed in Chicago's landmark Atlantic Bank Building on Michigan Avenue, the luxury lodging is just seconds away from Millennium Park, home to the iconic Bean (Cloud Gate) sculpture. Spend your days exploring the city on foot - the stylish sophistication of Magnificent Mile and artistic wonder of Cultural Mile are just a short walk away.

Named for Saint Julian, the patron saint of hospitality and travellers, Hotel Julian is an elegant retreat for weary heads. Throw open the blinds every morning to check out the streets below, before fitting in a quick workout at the state-of-the-art fitness centre. Make sure you’re ready for the day with breakfast at the ground floor About Last Knife restaurant, before venturing out to explore all the city has to offer. Stop by About Last Knife for a nightcap on your way back, or make a beeline for bed, wrapped up in your Frette bathrobe.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions**

- A **waived resort fee** gives you perks for free, including wellbeing packs, in-room Wi-Fi and espresso coffee, and access to the fitness centre

**Travelling with family or friends?** Upgrade to the Elite Double Queen: the spacious room has two queen beds, meaning up to two extra guests can stay (surcharges apply, see package for details).
offer_address: 168 North Michigan Ave, Chicago, Illinois 60601

vendor_name: The Allegro Royal Sonesta Hotel Chicago Loop
title: Downtown Chicago City Break with Cocktail Bar
description: Old-school glamour meets modern sophistication at The Allegro Royal Sonesta Hotel, a  gem in the heart of Chicago's cool downtown area, moments from the city's most notable attractions. Thanks to the hotel's convenient location, the sights of Chicago are right on your doorstep, with the River Walk, the Goodman Theatre, Millennium Park and Cloud Gate all within a 15-minute walk. Between exploring the city's sights, work up a sweat at the fitness centre, where a selection of Peloton Bikes is guaranteed to elevate your workout, while evenings are for unwinding with a cocktail or two at the hotel's sultry Bar Allegro, or for a long, leisurely Italian-inspired dinner at theatre-district favourite, 312 Chicago.
location_description: The Allegro Royal Sonesta Hotel Chicago Loop
offer_address: 171 W. Randolph Street, Chicago, IL 60601

title: Sophisticated Chicago All-Suite Retreat near Magnificent Mile with Signature Restaurant
description:
Savour the epitome of Chicago's urban elegance at this chic city haven, perfectly situated mere steps from the iconic Magnificent Mile, home to world-class shopping, dining and nightlife. From vibrant cultural landmarks to Michelin-starred dining, explore it all within a short stroll of this impressive city address. Embark on urban adventures with guided pizza tours and the Chicago mobster tour and experience the Windy City to the fullest.

After a day of exploration, return to your well-appointed suite, embracing historical elements from the works of renowned Chicago architect Louis Sullivan. When hunger strikes, make your way to the fourth-floor 676 Restaurant & Bar, boasting chef-curated specialities and inspired cocktails.
offer_address: 676 North Michigan Avenue, Chicago, Illinois 60611, USA

title: Five-Star Nobu Hotel Chicago Escape in the Dynamic West Loop with Signature Restaurant & Rooftop Bar
description:
Urban elegance and cutting-edge design come together at Nobu Hotel Chicago, a luxe five-star offering from Robert De Niro's Nobu Hospitality Group. The hotel boasts a distinct Japanese-inspired aesthetic fused with ultra-modern facilities and a stellar location in the city's West Loop neighbourhood. Make good use of the state-of-the-art fitness centre and the indoor tranquility pool, then head up to The Rooftop, where an indoor lounge and outdoor terrace overlook Restaurant Row, Chicago's buzzing foodie district. You can't leave without dining at the hotel's ground-floor signature Nobu restaurant, where celebrity chef Nobuyuki “Nobu” Matsuhisa's creations come to life.

Thanks to the hotel's prime location in Chicago's Fulton Market district, you have the city's top restaurants, great breweries, cafés, cocktail bars and live music venues at your fingertips. Just a short drive away are Chicago's most iconic sights, including Millennium Park, the Art Institute of Chicago and Wrigley Field.
offer_address: 155 N Peoria St, Chicago, IL 60607

title: Luxe Chicago Heritage Escape within Downtown Chicago's Loop
description: Steep yourself in Chicago history with a stay at the illustrious Pendry Chicago, housed within the 1929 Carbide & Carbon Building in downtown Chicago’s Loop neighbourhood. Art Deco history blends with modern luxury to create a launchpad for the city's famous attractions. Venture out of the lavish hotel to be met with an array of world-class restaurants and cocktail bars, along with historic architecture, an exemplary theatre district and quintessential art museums.
offer_address: 230 North Michigan Avenue, Chicago, IL 60601

title: Boutique Chicago Loop Stay near Magnificent Mile with Bistro, Bar & Gym
description: Make your visit to the Windy City a memorable one with a beyond-comfy stay at the stylishly modern Kimpton Hotel Monaco Chicago, an IHG Hotel. Set on the lively bank of the Chicago Riverwalk and right inside the Loop, here its easy to enjoy long days exploring the Midwest's culture capital or admire the soaring skyline. When you're thirsty, Fisk & Co. on the street level - renowned for delicious mussels and beer - is the perfect place to unwind each night and watch the city pass you by.
location_description: Kimpton Hotel Monaco Chicago, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 225 N Wabash Avenue, Chicago, Illinois, 60601, United States

title: Stylish Riverfront Chicago Escape in the Heart of Downtown
description: Where the storied Chicago River meets the magnificent Michigan Avenue lies the Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown, the perfect launchpad for any traveller looking to experience the best of everything the Windy City offers. Royal Sonesta Chicago Downtown’s reimagined and restored interiors warmly invigorate the hotel’s original historic building, and the expansive rooms and suites and Chicago Riverwalk location make it an unbeatable spot for friends, families and couples seeking the perfect urban escape. Enjoy a menu brimming with delicious classics at Hoyt’s American Tavern, take advantage of the hotel’s cutting-edge fitness facilities or simply step outside and feel the cool river breeze. You’ll be only a short stroll away from many of Chicago’s must-see destinations, including the Magnificent Mile, Lincoln Park and the Loop.
offer_address: 71 E Wacker Dr, Chicago, IL 60601, USA

title: Bustling Chicago Loop District Hotel with Rooftop Cocktail Bar
description: Kimpton Gray Hotel, an IHG Hotel epitomises timeless luxury in the heart of Chicago. Each meticulously designed room and suite offers a sanctuary of sophistication, with Nespresso coffee machines, deep soaking tubs and accessible-friendly amenities available in select rooms. Enjoy a cocktail at one of the hotel's bespoke bars, before indulging in an upscale dining experience at The Fillmore restaurant, where culinary artistry and impeccable service combine.
location_description: Kimpton Gray Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 122 W Monroe St, Chicago, IL 60603, United States

title: Award-Winning Boutique 1920s-Inspired Chicago Gold Coast Escape with Rooftop Pool
description:
Experience all the Windy City has to offer with an escape at Viceroy Chicago, a boutique five-star luxury hotel with views over Lake Michigan. Located in the upmarket Gold Coast neighbourhood, this 1920s-inspired hotel is in the heart of the action, sitting by world-class restaurants, beautiful bars, contemporary museums and the Magnificent Mile shopping strip. Start your day with a dip at nearby Oak Street Beach, before pounding the pavement - the Loop, otherwise known as downtown Chicago, is a 25-minute walk away. If you’d rather travel by wheels, borrow a complimentary bicycle.

Blending the reconstructed 1920s façade with 18 storeys of a glass-lined building, Viceroy Chicago is a showstopper from the moment you walk through its heritage doors. Awards include a spot on the Top 10 City Hotels in Chicago list at Travel + Leisure World's Best Awards 2020 and a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2020 stamp. Rooms and suites are a masterclass in mid-century glamour, with jewelled tones, marble bathrooms and floor-to-ceiling windows looking over the city or Lake Michigan. Pop into Somerset restaurant on your way out the door to grab a portable breakfast, or return when the sun sets to experience its full offering of seasonal American cuisine. Venture up to the 18th floor to find a seasonal rooftop pool with sensational city views and Devereaux rooftop lounge, where small plates and crafted cocktails are the order of the day. Should you want to get the body moving, a state-of-the-art fitness centre has every piece of equipment you’ll need to really work up a sweat.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages/nights)**

- Build the energy to explore the Windy City with **US$30 daily breakfast credit** per room
- Sample delicious small plates and craft cocktails at Devereaux rooftop bar with **US$10 drinks and dining credit** per room, per stay
- Arrive to a **welcome gift** of delicious treats
- Spend every second you can at Viceroy Chicago with **2pm late checkout** (on request)
- Feel like a VIP with a **complimentary room upgrade** from a Superior King (Deluxe Kings only)
- Enjoy a tipple or two with **US$10 minibar credit** per room, per stay (for stays of 5+ nights)

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to a Deluxe Lake View Queen Queen Room or One Bedroom Lake View Suite for up to four guests.
offer_address: 1118 N State Street, Chicago, Illinois 60610 USA

title: Boutique Luxury in the Heart of Chicago's Gold Coast
description:
Discover a slice of serenity in one of Chicago’s most happening neighbourhoods at Claridge House, a boutique hotel that will become your home away from home.

The calm oasis is a rare find, offering peace and quiet while remaining in the thick of the Gold Coast action, with some of the city’s best restaurants, attractions and landmarks right outside the hotel’s doors. Spend your days wandering the Magnificent Mile, shopping until you drop in Oak Street’s luxury boutiques, or admiring the amazing architecture at Millennium Park. Minimalist styling meets maximum comfort in Claridge House’s rooms and suites, with modern touches for a stress-free stay. Dial-up the relaxation at the onsite spa, indulging in a massage or facial, or get lost in conversation and conviviality at Juniper Restaurant, where handcrafted martinis flow freely.
offer_address: 1244 N Dearborn Pkwy, Chicago, Il 60610

title: Historic Luxury in the Heart of Chicago with Day Spa & Award-Winning Steakhouse
description: Immerse yourself in the Windy City with a stay at InterContinental Chicago Magnificent Mile, an IHG Hotel. Perfectly positioned on the city's famed shopping boulevard, this historic hotel offers easy access to the Art Institute of Chicago, Navy Pier and the buzzing River North district. Savour culinary delights at onsite Michael Jordan's Steak House or take a dip in the junior Olympic-sized pool. Venture out to explore the vibrant theatre district or take a stroll along scenic Lake Michigan.
location_description: InterContinental Chicago Magnificent Mile, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 505 North Michigan Ave, Chicago, Illinois 60611, United States

vendor_name: Staypineapple, An Iconic Hotel, The Loop Chicago
title: Top-Rated Chicago Escape in the Heart of Stylish Downtown
description:
Stay in the heart of Chicago’s thriving metropolis at the stylish Staypineapple, An Iconic Hotel, The Loop Chicago. Find the brand's cheeky signature yellow pineapple touches throughout this boutique hotel; from the pineapple-shaped welcome cookies to the emblazoned phone chargers and embroidered pillows. Visit Atwood restaurant and bar and order yourself a signature cocktail before hitting the town, then borrow a beach cruiser bicycle and cycle along the lake or simply spend your time exploring the city on foot.

Housed in a National Historic Monument building, smack-bang in the thick of the Chicago Loop, the hotel affords easy access to a plethora of eateries, shopping, cafés, theatres, parks and the Art Institute of Chicago. You’re only steps from the instantly recognisable Millennium Park, home to the Crown Fountain, The Bean and Jay Pritzker Pavilion. This chic hotel received a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 award, placing it among the top 10% of properties worldwide on the review site.
location_description: Staypineapple, An Iconic Hotel, The Loop Chicago
offer_address: 1 W Washington St, Chicago, IL 60602, United States

title: Glamorous Five-Star Chicago Langham Stay with Restaurant & Day Spa
description: Experience the epitome of five-star luxury with a stay at The Langham, Chicago, an opulent retreat within one of the city's incredibly designed skyscrapers. Just steps from the Magnificent Mile, the hotel offers easy access to the Chicago Riverwalk, world-class museums, and a vibrant dining scene. Indulge with a treatment at the tranquil Chuan Spa, take a dip in the indoor swimming pool, savour culinary delights at Travelle or sit down to an elegant afternoon tea at Pavilion.
offer_address: 330 North Wabash Avenue, Chicago, Illinois 60611, United States

title: Downtown Chicago Boutique Escape in Prime Location
description:
Discover the history and charm of Chicago’s Gold Coast district with a stay at Gale Chicago, a boutique hotel close to the city’s best sights. Expect warm, unparalleled service and incredible facilities during your stay. Order a coffee and breakfast from Angora Coffee, catch the sunset sinking over skyscrapers from a rooftop terrace, or twirl spaghetti while drinking wine at Pelago Ristorante, an Italian restaurant created by Chef Mauro Mafrici of New York's Michelin-starred Lo Scalco restaurant fame.

The Gold Coast district with its picture-perfect streets, heritage mansions and designer boutiques evoke the romance and luxury of the 19th century. Feel away from the hustle and bustle of the city without being too far from the action. Chicago’s famous sights are less than a 10-minute drive away: you could spend days exploring Millennium Park and the instantly recognisable Cloud Gate sculpture, the Art Institute of Chicago, Shedd Aquarium and the buzzing shops, gardens and restaurants of Navy Pier.
offer_address: 201 E Delaware Pl. Chicago IL. 606 11. USA Chicago IL 60611 US
